snippet: Shawn Scott, 24, and Akein Scott, 19, were both charged with 20 counts of attempted second-degree murder and 14 counts of aggravated assault with a firearm.
abstract: Orleans Parish grand jury indicts brothers Shawn and Akein Scott in Mother's Day parade shooting in New Orleans, charging them with 20 counts of attempted second-degree murder and 14 counts of aggravated assault with a firearm.
lead_paragraph: Shawn Scott, 24, and Akein Scott, 19, were both charged with 20 counts of attempted second-degree murder and 14 counts of aggravated assault with a firearm.

headline.main: Louisiana Brothers Are Indicted in Mother’s Day Shooting
headline.print_headline: Louisiana: Brothers Are Indicted In Mother’s Day Shooting
